net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
Class AbstractLinesOfCode

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.Calculator
      net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.AbstractLinesOfCode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, ICalculator
Direct Known Subclasses:
MethodLinesOfCode, TotalLinesOfCode
public abstract class AbstractLinesOfCode
extends Calculator

Replace old LOC calculator which does not handle comments correctly. This implementatin uses the Eclipse IScanner to parse the code

Since:
1.3.6
Author:
Guillaume Boissier
